bootcamp.title: Code Quiz
bootcamp.description: A multiple-choice coding quiz that can keep track of high scores and quiz-takers' initials. This app run in the browser, and it is UI is developed with HTML and CSS and using Vanilla JavaScript

bootcamp.title: Daily Planner App
bootcamp.description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day. This app implements DOM manipulation, and integration of Web APIs, like session and local storage. This app run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS using Vanilla JavaScript.

bootcamp.title: Weather Dashboard
bootcamp.description: A web application to search for weather forecasts in geographic locations around the world. This app implements DOM manipulation, and integration of Web APIs, like session and local storage. This app run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS using Vanilla JavaScript.

bootcamp.title: Fakee-Shop
bootcamp.description: Fakee-Shop is an implementation of an online retail store, starting from a given UX/UI concept, and creating an MVP in a sprint of 2 weeks, using rapid prototyping frameworks.

bootcamp.title: Professional README Generator
bootcamp.description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file from a user's input using the Inquirer package.

bootcamp.title: Team Profile Generator
bootcamp.description: A Node.js CLI application that will take in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person, following Agile methodology, OO paradigm and TDD/BDD development in JavaScript.
